metadata.title: CVE-2023-45871 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/net/ethernet/intel/igb/igb_main.c in theIGB driver in the Linux kernel before 6.5.3. A buffer size may not beadequate for frames larger than the MTU.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45871` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-89-generic - 5.15.0-89.99
